thread.title: Watt’s That? Siemens Pins Hopes on Small Gas Turbines

author: Russell Gold
title: Watt’s That? Siemens Pins Hopes on Small Gas Turbines

organizations.name: siemens pins hopes on small gas

text:
HOUSTON—Depressed demand for large gas turbines has hurt revenue at Siemens AG, but the German engineering conglomerate hopes to offset part of the industry slump by building smaller power plants.
Siemens Chief Executive Joe Kaeser said in a recent interview with The Wall Street Journal that he expected demand for its smaller and more nimble gas turbines to increase as utilities construct more power plants able to quickly respond to changes in power demand.
...
